summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3835 for the improvement of the alley in block 43, J.H. Nagle's 1st Addition being the alley between 12th Avenue North and 13th Avenue North, from East Denny Way to East John Street; and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47068, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
